remarks: Relation between the size of the orbit and the size of the stabilizer of a point in a finite group action.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jan-2015.)
statement:
orbsta2.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
orbsta2.h $e |- H = { u e. X | ( u .(+) A ) = A } $.
orbsta2.r $e |- .~ = ( G ~QG H ) $.
orbsta2.o $e |- O = { <. x , y >. | ( { x , y } C_ Y /\ E. g e. X ( g .(+) x ) = y ) } $.
orbsta2 $p |- ( ( ( .(+) e. ( G GrpAct Y ) /\ A e. Y ) /\ X e. Fin ) -> ( # ` X ) = ( ( # ` [ A ] O ) x. ( # ` H ) ) ) $.
$d .(+) g u x y $.
$d .~ g x y $.
$d A g u x y $.
$d G g u x y $.
$d H x y $.
$d X g u x y $.
$d Y g x y $.
